arts.ttl: Report: Bristol City miss chance to close gap to play-off places with loss vs Coventry City
arts.sum: Brandon Thomas-Asanteâ€™s 63rd-minute strike was the difference between the two sides with the former West Brom forward powering a shot high and into the back of the net having skipped past Luke McNally in the Reds' penalty area. The Robins had the chance to take the lead five minutes later when an Mehmeti cross from the left-hand side forced Dovin to go down low to make a save.

arts.ttl: Coventry City 1 - 0 Bristol City live: Thomas-Asante gives Sky Blues lead in second-half - Bristol Live
arts.sum: Hello and welcome to this afternoon's live blog as Bristol City look to extend their unbeaten run in the Championship to five games against Coventry City at The CBS Arena. Coventry knocked the Reds out of the Carabao Cup at Ashton Gate as Ellis Simms' goal proved to be the difference between the two sides before goals from George Tanner and Kasey Palmer saw the points shared in a 1-1 draw in the league .

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Coventry City as Reds suffer first Championship defeat of 2025
arts.sum: Like Mehmeti, the game appeared to pass Twine by for much of the afternoon. Got caught on the wrong side of the ball a few times in the first half as Milan van Ewijk beat him down the line.

arts.ttl: Brandon Thomas-Asante gives Coventry victory over Bristol City
arts.sum: A single goal separated the teams at the CBS Arena.

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Coventry City as Robins look to bounce back from FA Cup exit
arts.sum: Liam Manning's Robins make the journey to the CBS Arena to face Frank Lampard's Sky Blues on Saturday afternoon as they look to extend their unbeaten run in the Championship to five matches, having picked up 10 points from a possible 12 over the festive period. Yes, Elijah Morrison could be given a surprise start instead but judging by the fact he didn't come off the bench in last week's FA Cup game, our bet is that he will once again take his place among the substitutes.

arts.ttl: Bristol City's top-six rivals hire experienced Championship manager after Christmas Eve exit
arts.sum: Bristol City's Championship rivals West Brom have hired Tony Mowbray as their new manager almost a month after Carlos Corberan's exit. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.

arts.ttl: Coventry City transfer state of play as calls made on pair with 'potential' for more moves
arts.sum: He and his staff will assess both Burroughs and Howley upon their return and, if the pieces fall into place and the Sky Blues are able to secure a sufficient number of new faces, then Lampard sees no reason why the pair cannot head back out on loan this month. They have made calls to recall both Ryan Howley from his loan spell with Ayr United and Jack Burroughs from Kilmarnock.

arts.ttl: What Bristol City can expect from Frank Lampard's Coventry City after 'shock to the system'
arts.sum: Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community. Frank Lampard's Sky Blues are currently 16th in the Championship table, only six points clear of Hull City who occupy the final spot in the relegation zone and 12 away from the top six.

arts.ttl: Coventry City predicted XI v Bristol City with four decisions awaiting Frank Lampard
arts.sum: While Bobby Thomas has been a regular, the selection otherwise recently has been relatively fluid - in the cup, it was Joel Latibeaudiere who missed out to Thomas, Liam Kitching - who scored - and Luis Binks. Since, though, there has been the shot in the arm of FA Cup progress, claimed at the expense of Sheffield Wednesday on penalties last weekend, but the focus returns solely on the Championship, and the first of the latest three-game week.

arts.ttl: Coventry City handed injury boost ahead of Bristol City clash as Lampard shares fitness update
arts.sum: Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community. Coventry City have been handed an injury boost ahead of Bristol City's trip to The CBS Arena with Frank Lampard confirming Ben Wilson is once again available for selection.
